articles.author: Matt O'brien And Raf Casert, The Associated Press
articles.title: EU's Call of Duty: Probe Microsoft-Activision Blizzard deal - Cochrane Today
articles.description: BRUSSELS (AP) — The European Union has launched an investigation into Microsoft’s planned takeover of video game giant Activision Blizzard, fearing the $69 billion deal would distort fair competition to popular titles like Call of Duty .
articles.content: BRUSSELS (AP) The European Union has launched an investigation into Microsofts planned takeover of video game giant Activision Blizzard, fearing the $69 billion deal would distort fair competition to… [+4504 chars]
